attributes.action: Disolve this parliement as we have no confidence in it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The parliment has failed the confidence of the people. This parliment is no longer able to serve the people of this country. The only course left is to call an election at the earliest oprtunity and followed by referundum to change the whole system of government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
